name: 莊朝尹
objective:
展示設計是策展者與參觀者交流的手段，而以家具作為展示主體，更進一步對展示設計提出了限制與要求。本課程將從展示設計的基礎理論介紹，到展示空間之規劃過程，讓學生了解展示規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。此外，本課程將透過實際案例分析，探討家具展示設計的各種可能性。
Display design is a means of communication between curators and visitors, and with furniture as the main body of display, it further puts forward restrictions and requirements on display design. This course will start with basic theories of display design, and develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design. In addition, the course will explore various possibilities for furniture display design through real-world case studies.
